About Us

"Teaching is our speciality and science is our passion!"

Maharaja Academy is a coaching Institute in Rohini(Pooth Kalan),Delhi-110086,India.Founded in 2009, with a vision to develop scientific perception in students. Since then our teachers have been constantly developing new ways to make science interesting and easy to learn.

Say Hi to our team!

Shivam Kaushik - Techonology Head

Shivam Kaushik is also known for A.O.C. classes for physics.He is designer,creator and maintainer of this website. He conducts various activities to make study enjoyable experience.He has developed this website and various other projects @maharajaAcademy. Visit his Profile :- Mythrex.github.io

Hemant Goswami - Math Teacher

Mr. Goswami is B.Sc., Btech., Mtech. .Having immense interest in mathematics he chose teaching as his main profession now.

Santaraj Sir - Chemistry Teacher

With over 16-17 years of experience Santraj sir has made a his name in chemistry. He has a lot of tricks that helps students in time for exams.

Pankaj Thakur - Biology Teacher

Mr. Pankaj Thakur is N.E.T. qualifier and guest lecturer in Delhi University.He is pursuing Ph.D. from Delhi University.
